apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this heartwarming emoji depicts a loving couple, one with a medium-dark skin tone and the other with a dark skin tone, embracing with a radiant heart floating between them, all rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D effect and smooth gradients. Their intertwined forms and the glowing heart symbolize deep affection, unity, and romantic connection. This emoji on Apple devices is a vibrant expression of love, partnership, and shared joy.
